attributes.action: Petition to Reform the UK Mental Health System for Everyone with Mental Illness
attributes.additional_details:
1. Update the UK mental health system to treat all illnesses including BPD with care
2.Bring UK mental health services into the 21st century for BPD and all conditions
3.End stigma and improve support for BPD and all mental health conditions in the UK
attributes.background: I want the government to bring a new mental health system but for the 21st century it’s old school it needs reforming now to many people r suffering & the risk of suicide is getting bigger cause of the system

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We are not sure how exactly you'd like the Government to reform the mental health system.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. If you would like specific changes in relation to the way that BPD is treated, you could submit a petition about that.
